Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Oak Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Oak Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Cumberland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Cumberland.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
